Name: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' occurrences out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases

Name: Number of times 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' appears in the event log
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities

Name: Percentage of process variants that include 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' following 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' that occur after a manuscript has been accepted (e.g., preceded by 'RW-EIC Accept')
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'RW-EIC Accept'

Name: Ratio of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' occurrences to 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' occurrences
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Number of cases where 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' is directly preceded by 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities that appear in variants ending with production-related steps versus those ending in rejection or withdrawal
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' in comparison to other post-acceptance activities such as 'First Look-Please submit updates'
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'First Look-Please submit updates'

Name: Percentage of all accepted manuscripts (those containing 'RW-EIC Accept' or 'SW-EIC Accept') that eventually reach 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'RW-EIC Accept'

Name: Number of distinct process variants that contain 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' that are followed by another 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' within the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Frequency of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' relative to the total number of cases in the log
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of cases containing 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' that originate from a revision cycle (i.e., include 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation')
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Ratio of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' occurrences to the total number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' events
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
